text: William Nicholas Snyder (January 28, 1898 – October 8, 1934) was an American Major League Baseball pitcher from Mansfield, Ohio who appeared in 18 games between 1919 and 1920 for the Washington Senators. Snyder died in Vicksburg, Michigan on October 8, 1934. ==References== ==External links== *Baseball- Reference.com Category:1898 births Category:1934 deaths Category:Baseball players from Ohio Category:Washington Senators (1901–1960) players Category:Sportspeople from Mansfield, Ohio Category:People from Vicksburg, Michigan
title: Bill Snyder (baseball)
